product_name: The North Face Campfly Tailout Rain Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Campfly Tailout Rain Jacket for toddler girls sports an abstract butterfly print that brings this waterproof and breathable jacket to life during springtime rain showers. Polyester shell features HyVent 2-layer waterproof/breathable laminate and sealed seams for ironclad protection from precipitation. Mesh-lined body and brushed collar lining enhance breathability and comfort. The North Face Campfly Tailout Rain Jacket features a hood, chin guard, rip-and-stick storm flap, elasticized cuffs and ID label.
short_description: The North Face Campfly Tailout Rain Jacket for toddler girls sports an abstract butterfly print that brings this waterproof and breathable jacket to life during springtime rain showers.
